data.actual_result: You get thrown down into the suggestions list. Keyboard still closes.
data.expected_result: The list should remain where it is, and the keyboard should hopefully close itself.
data.short_description: Clicking enter on the comments typefield in the share screen flings you down the list.
data.steps_to_repro: - Share a file to open the Share screen.  - Select who you're sending it to. - Select the comments typefield.  - Click enter, without typing anything. - Note: It looks like it's trying to get you ready to type in the bar where you select who the file is going to. Just a theory.
